title: ‘American Idol’ winner Scotty McCreery cited for trying to carry loaded gun through airport checkpoint

twitter.title: ‘American Idol’ winner Scotty McCreery cited for trying to carry loaded gun through airport checkpoint
twitter.description: Season 10 “American Idol” winner and Garner native Scotty McCreery was cited last week for trying to carry a loaded gun through a passenger checkpoint at Raleigh-Durham International Airport, authorities reported.

og.title: ‘American Idol’ winner Scotty McCreery cited for trying to carry loaded gun through airport checkpoint
og.description: Season 10 “American Idol” winner and Garner native Scotty McCreery was cited last week for trying to carry a loaded gun through a passenger checkpoint at Raleigh-Durham International Airport, authorities reported.
